metadata.name: Aesthetics of the future
metadata.description:
Artwork created as part of the "The streak of immortality" project and was exhibited at the International Art Exibition in Venice.

Darya Jumelya as member of transdisciplinary collective ORTA represents Kazakhstan for its first national participation at the 59th International Art Exibition - La Biennale di Venezia, 23 April - 27 November 2022.

1 of 1

3840 x 2160 pixels (4K)  
3 frames GIF seamless loop

Darya Jumelya, 2019
